Class StockControllerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.StockControllerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockController
    public class StockControllerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockController
    Class that controls all the stock funtions and implements the stock controller.
